channel.title: Feng Yun's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Feng Yun's Blog

item.title: About
item.description:
This is Feng Yun’s blog.

I’m a DevOps engineer with a passion for tabletop role-playing games, particularly Call of Cthulhu.

Here, you’ll find articles featuring my study notes on Python, Go, and other programming languages, along with discussions about TRPGs and insights into my self-developed tools.

Feel free to reach out at fengyun.1997@outlook.com. I’d love to connect!
